meanings.definition: Failing in or neglectful of duty or obligation
meanings.sent1: The delinquent student forgot to turn in his homework.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was disappointed with the delinquent behavior of the student.
meanings.sent3: The delinquent puppy chewed up all the shoes in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her delinquent attitude towards work was like a dark cloud over the team.
meanings.sent5: The delinquent gardener neglected the plants until they withered away.

meanings.sent1: The delinquent bill caused stress for the family.
meanings.sent2: The company sent a reminder for the delinquent payment.
meanings.sent3: The delinquent credit card statement hid under a pile of papers.
meanings.sent4: His delinquent debt weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The delinquent loan led to financial troubles for the business.
